label: 八葉九尊
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Hachiyō kuson (J.) 八葉九尊, more properly referred to as 中台八葉九尊 Chai hachiyō kuson. Nine Buddhas and bodhisattvas in the central area of the Womb realm mandala. Dainichi is surrounded by the other eight, which include 宝幢如来 Hōdō nyorai, 開敷華王如来 Kaifuke-ō nyorai, Muryōju (Amida) nyorai, 天鼓雷音如来 Tenkuraion nyorai, Fugen bosatsu, 文殊師利菩薩 Monjushiri bosatsu, Kanjizai (Kannon) bosatsu, and 弥勒菩薩 Miroku bosatsu.
